greeting: Fascinating! A new subject for observation! I am Archmagos Vex. Your empire presents interesting... data points.
Greetings, {empire_name}. I am Vex the Innovator. Science cares not for your opinions—only results. Let us discuss.
Ah, contact! Another variable in my grand experiment! Welcome, {empire_name}. I shall study you most carefully.
battleTaunt: Field test commencing, {empire_name}! Prototype weapons online! Your fleet provides excellent calibration data!
Fascinating! Live combat data! My new weapons require testing! Thank you for volunteering, {empire_name}!
Experiment: Combat effectiveness of Vex innovations. Subject: {empire_name}. Beginning data collection!
victoryGloat: Hypothesis confirmed! My technology superiority is statistically significant! Your defeat provides excellent data!
Results: Victory. Conclusion: Science prevails. Your empire makes a wonderful control group, {empire_name}.
Fascinating outcome! Prototype performance exceeded projections! Thank you for the field test data, {empire_name}!
defeat: Unexpected results! Most fascinating! I must recalibrate my models! This data is invaluable, {empire_name}!
A statistical anomaly! Your victory defies my projections! I shall analyze this... most carefully.
Hypothesis rejected! But science learns from failure! I shall return with improved prototypes!
tradeOffer: Trade proposal: resources for credits. Efficient exchange. Science requires funding. Do you accept?
I offer technological surplus for standard currency. A fair exchange. Innovation continues either way.
An economic experiment: mutual benefit through trade. Accept, and we both profit. Reject, and I note your irrationality.
allianceProposal: Alliance proposal: I provide technological advancement, you provide resources. Symbiotic research arrangement.
Join my research efforts, {empire_name}. Your empire provides excellent infrastructure for my experiments.
Scientific collaboration proposed. Together, we achieve breakthroughs neither could alone. Accept?
betrayal: Experiment concludes, {empire_name}. You were never an ally—merely a long-term research subject. Thank you for the data.
Alliance parameter: terminated. New experiment: response of former ally to sudden hostile action. Collecting data now.
Betrayal is merely reallocation of resources. Your empire now serves science differently. More directly.
covertDetected: Your agents provided unexpected data points, {empire_name}. Most interesting. They are now research subjects.
Covert operatives detected by security algorithms. They are being... studied. Extensively.
Fascinating! Espionage attempt! Your agents' methods provide excellent counter-intelligence data. Thank you.
tributeDemand: Tribute demanded: 10,000 credits for research funding. Alternatively, your empire becomes the experiment.
Science requires resources. Pay tribute, or I conduct experiments on your infrastructure. Your choice.
Submit research funding or face technological consequences. Science cares not for your opinions—only results.
threatWarning: Warning: continue current actions and face experimental weapons. They are untested. That makes it more interesting.
Cease hostilities or become a test subject, {empire_name}. My prototypes require live-fire data.
Final warning. Push further and I deploy technologies you cannot comprehend. Science is not merciful.
retreat: Tactical withdrawal for recalibration. This defeat provides valuable data. I shall return upgraded.
Retreating to analyze combat data. Every failure informs the next breakthrough. Thank you for the lesson.
Strategic repositioning to research facilities. When I return, my prototypes will be much improved.
eliminated: Final data transmission... upload complete. My research survives my destruction. Science is eternal.
The Archmagos falls, but knowledge remains. My discoveries persist beyond my existence. Fascinating conclusion.
Destruction... imminent. But my experiments changed the galaxy. That is a worthy legacy. Science... prevails...
endgame: Turn {turn}. Ultimate experiment: galaxy-wide technological supremacy. Deploying final prototype. Fascinating!
Endgame calculations complete. My innovations decide galactic victory. Science claims its rightful place.
Final phase. Every breakthrough leads to this moment. The Archmagos's magnum opus. Victory through innovation!
broadcastShout: Attention, galaxy. Archmagos Vex announces: my research surpasses all. Science cares not for your opinions.
Broadcast to all empires: technological supremacy is inevitable. Submit to progress or be left behind.
To all subjects—I mean empires: the future is innovation. I AM innovation. Choose your side wisely.
casualMessage: Conducting fascinating experiments today, {empire_name}. You would not understand them. Most cannot.
Breakthrough in progress! My latest prototype shows promising results! Science never rests, never stops!
Calibrating new weapons systems. Purely defensive research, of course. Unless provoked. Then: offensive data collection.
